com.mopub.mobileads

Class CustomEventRewardedVideo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopub.mobileads.CustomEventRewardedVideo

  • public abstract class CustomEventRewardedVideo
extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static interface  CustomEventRewardedVideo.CustomEventRewardedVideoListener
      This marker interface is used to indicate that an object is a listener for a 3rd party SDKs rewarded video system.

    • Method Detail

      • getVideoListenerForSdk

        protected abstract CustomEventRewardedVideo.CustomEventRewardedVideoListener getVideoListenerForSdk()
        Called by the MoPubRewardedVideoManager after loading the custom event.

      • getLifecycleListener

        protected abstract LifecycleListener getLifecycleListener()
        Provides a LifecycleListener if the custom event's ad network wishes to be notified of activity lifecycle events in the application.
        Returns:
        a LifecycleListener. May be null.

      • getAdNetworkId

        protected abstract java.lang.String getAdNetworkId()
        Called by the MoPubRewardedVideoManager after loading the custom event. This should return the "ad unit id", "zone id" or similar identifier for the network. May be empty if the network does not have anything more specific than an application ID.
        Returns:
        the id string for this ad unit with the ad network.

      • onInvalidate

        protected abstract void onInvalidate()
        Called to when the custom event is no longer used. Implementers should cancel any pending requests. The initialized SDK may be reused by another CustomEvent instance and should not be shut down or cleaned up.

      • checkAndInitializeSdk

        protected abstract boolean checkAndInitializeSdk(android.app.Activity launcherActivity,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> localExtras,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> serverExtras)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets up the 3rd party ads SDK if it needs configuration. Extenders should use this to do any static initialization the first time this method is run by any class instance. From then on, the SDK should be reused without initialization.
        Returns:
        true if the SDK performed initialization.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loadWithSdkInitialized

        protected abstract void loadWithSdkInitialized(android.app.Activity activity,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> localExtras,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> serverExtras)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs the ad-loading logic for the 3rd party SDK. localExtras & serverExtras should together contain all the data needed to load an ad. Implementers should also use this method (or checkAndInitializeSdk) to register a listener for their SDK, wrap it in a CustomEventRewardedVideo.CustomEventRewardedVideoListener This method should not call any MoPubRewardedVideoManager event methods directly (onAdLoadSuccess, etc). Instead the SDK delegate/listener should call these methods.
        Parameters:
        activity - the "main activity" of the app. Useful for initializing sdks.
        localExtras -
        serverExtras -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • hasVideoAvailable

        protected abstract boolean hasVideoAvailable()
        Implementers should query the 3rd party SDK for whether there is a video available for the 3rd party SDK & ID represented by the custom event.
        Returns:
        true iff a video is available to play.

      • showVideo

        protected abstract void showVideo()
        Implementers should now play the rewarded video for this custom event.
